name: Uninhabitable
description:
A hazmat suited  s c  ou t  is sent to explore what remains of a crumbling  bo m b   sh e l t e r. Traverse the deadly repercussions of the downfall and uncover its mystery in this story driven precision platformer.

UNINHABITABLE will be available to download as Pay What You Like on March 28th. 

DEMO is available below.


  • WARNING  This program contains bright flashing images
  •   Headphones highly recommended
  •  This program runs in windowed mode only

Visit the Uninhabitable website for more details
